creator: Cool4Apps
descriptionHtml:
Play now the #1 addictive game of the year! Crazy Colors : Match the Color Challenge Infinity Game

> How to play ?

- Stay focus, be concentrate and Tap the ball (color dot) carefully through each obstacle / shape.
- You must follow the color pattern on each obstacle to cross it !
- Earn stars / powerups to unlock new balls.
- Beat Every Challenge and get a High Score in Endless.
- Be careful not to pass through the wrong color, or you’ll have to start again.

> New Original features / Game Modes / Challenges :

- Classic (endless, arcade mode).
- Tic-tac-toe switch mode.
- Spring mode.
- Flow the wall swich mode.
- Flappy Switching Colors mode.
- Neon Switch Mode.
- Colour dash Switch mode.
- Twist, Bounce, Matching Mode.
- Jump Circle Mode, Hop Hop Mode, Super switch X Twist color Mode.
- Match Mode, Puzzle Dash Mode.
- Twisty Mode, Match Circle - Dot Mode.
- Colorful shapes Mode, Match Circle - Dot Mode.
- Spinner Colours Mode.
- Fun Jumpy - Fly Swap Mode - Switch Flappy Mode.
- Zig Zag Mode - Swirl Colors Mode.
- Dash Switchy Up - Rise Phoenix Mode.
- Infinity Master Mode - Jumpy Jumper Mode.
- Jump Change Shapes (Stars, Ninja, Switcher, Fidget).
- Change and Match the shapes, colour, color, ballgame.
- 1 vs 1 mode - 2 vs 2 mode.
- Gravity, Anti Gravity Mode.
- Reverse, Line, Coloring Lines Mode.
- Pixel Art Mode Sandbox Hand.

Download NOW and Have fun with Crazy Colors : Match & Switch the Colour

French version :

Jouez à Crazy Colors : Match the Color Challenge Infinity Game - Version originale

le jeu le plus populaire de cette année 2020.

Comment jouer ?

- Appuyez sur la balle avec précision intense pour pouvoir traverser les différents obstacles
- Votre cercle changera de couleur à chaque intersection avec des bonus que vous rencontrez pendant votre voyage.
- Collectez tout les bonus
- Complétez tout les challenges

Soyez Concentré, prudent et intelligent afin que vous traversez les obstacles avec la couleur appropriée.

> Nouveaux Modes de jeu :

- Classic (endless, arcade mode).
- Tic-tac-toe switch mode.
- Spring mode.
- Flow the wall swich mode.
- Flappy Switching Colors mode.
- Neon Switch Mode.
- Colour dash Switch mode.
- Twist, Bounce, Matching Mode.
- Jump Circle Mode, Hop Hop Mode, Super switch X Twist color Mode.
- Match Mode, Puzzle Dash Mode.
- Twisty Mode, Match Circle - Dot Mode.
- Colorful shapes Mode, Match Circle - Dot Mode.
- Spinner Colours Mode.
- Fun Jumpy - Fly Swap Mode - Switch Flappy Mode.
- Zig Zag Mode - Swirl Colors Mode.
- Dash Switchy Up - Rise Phoenix Mode.
- Infinity Master Mode - Jumpy Jumper Mode.
- Jump Change Shapes (Stars, Ninja, Switcher, Fidget).
- Change and Match the shapes, colour, color, ballgame.
- 1 vs 1 mode - 2 vs 2 mode.
- Gravity, Anti Gravity Mode.
- Reverse, Line, Coloring Lines Mode.
- Pixel Art Mode Sandbox Hand.

Amusez-vous :D avec Crazy Colors : Match & Switch the Colour
descriptionShort: The #1 insane addicting game Crazy Colors is back with more game modes & fun
title: Crazy Colors : Match the Color Challenge Infinity
